blogs.title: How to use this blog
blogs.body: All posts on this app are public. You do not need an account to view them (hence this post). You do need an account to create and delete posts and you can only delete your own posts. Sign up/ log in as you would any other app. Dont worry about your passwords, they are all managed by google and I cant see any of that info. There is forgotten password functionality as well as the ability to edit your account details. Play around, have fun!
blogs.author: cole
